name: Solis' Armory
description:
I had the sudden passion to make a small intractable shop for Solis and wanted to see it through.

However I'm not a skilled coder and this was my first time handling anything of the sort I settled for an expository visual novel instead!

It's a very short novel and doesn't take long at all to read all the dialogue the game has to offer, but it's all my written, drawn, and scripted by me.

Perhaps someday I'll make a real shop, but that isn't going to happen anytime soon, especially since I have no experience..

If you're looking for a couple lines of dialogue paired with a few expression drawings of mine, look no further! I'm certain it'll elicit a giggle or two out of you!

And thanks to the Ren'py program for making it possible!

If you wanna see more of my drawings, I have a tumblr and a deviant-art

https://www.tumblr.com/blog/hero-of-dreams

https://www.deviantart.com/theheroofdreams
